products.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Cream Linen 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Genesis blackout luxe cream linen 89mm vertical blind in cream. Made to measure from 11.50 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their genesis luxe blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This neutral cream linen colour vertical blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blockout the light when desired.
 
 Product id: db-vtb1241 fabric colour: cream linen material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

The fleur range is a selection of great vertical blinds with a lovely textured pattern. 
 Their fleur linen vertical blind has a beautiful texture that will stand out in any room.

products.title: Lotus Linen
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure lotus linen standard vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
